Manga.name: 19 Days
Manga.creator: Old Xian
Manga.comments: After I left the cult and became an atheist, I wanted to know more about the outside world. I came across this manhua and was trusted into the world of boys' love. And that's how I learned that people should be allowed to love anyone they want.

Manga.name: Dandadan
Manga.creator: Yukinobu Tatsu
Manga.comments: I'm a sucker for horror. But every chapter of this manga is just great.

Manga.name: Demon Slayer
Manga.creator: Koyoharu Gotouge
Manga.comments: Once you get past the goofy art, you can start to appreciate the rich story of an asthmatic kid trying to save his sister. I too have a sister so I can relate.

Manga.name: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
Manga.creator: Tsukasa Abe, Kanehito Yamada
Manga.comments: I've always wondered about the life of someone like Legolas after the events of the One Ring. Most of the friendships he made would eventually die of old age while we remains. What is that experience like? Frieren is living through that herself and she takes us along her journey of self-discovery while remembering those that seemed transient in her life, but to whom she meant the world.

Manga.name: Gyo
Manga.creator: Junji Ito
Manga.comments: This would be the worst-case apocalyptic scenario for my wife. She has a profound hatred towards seafood.

Manga.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
Manga.creator: Gege Akutami
Manga.comments: I can't say this enough. The female characters in this story are some of the best written I've ever seen. My frame of reference is likely limiting, but I'm happy that this manga can be this fun with any unnecessary sexuality.

Manga.name: Kaiju No. 8
Manga.creator: Matsumoto Naoya
Manga.comments: If you liked Pacific Rim, you'll love this. It's just some good kaiju action-packed fun.

Manga.name: Nan Hao and Shang Feng
Manga.creator: Brownie
Manga.comments: I wish I had a friend like this growing up. But instead, I chose god.

Manga.name: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
Manga.creator: Hajime Kamoshida
Manga.comments: This hits on so many of the genres I enjoy and there's like two panels with a bunny girl on the entire series.

Manga.name: Rascal Does Not Dream of Petite Devil Kohai
Manga.creator: Hajime Kamoshida
Manga.comments: These titles are so misleading. There's no small satan's child, but there is a lot of physics.

Manga.name: Re Cervin
Manga.creator: Hamada Kosuke
Manga.comments: I think the mangaka will die before this story is done. Every page is just fucking awesome. They can't possibly keep this up.

Manga.name: SQ: Begin W/Your Name!
Manga.creator: Tan Jiu
Manga.comments: After leaving the cult, becoming an atheist, and discovering the world of yaoi, I wanted to read more about people loving people. Then, a wonderful person by the username of crosseyedcyclops recommended this great manhua about two girls falling in love. Been reading it religiously ever since.

Manga.name: Tokyo Ghoul
Manga.creator: Sui Ishida
Manga.comments: A young man with long term COVID symptoms has resorted to eating people because food tastes that awful.

Manga.name: Tokyo Revengers
Manga.creator: Ken Wakui
Manga.comments: Mickey is a piece of shit and you cannot change my mind. Fight me.

Manga.name: Uzumaki
Manga.creator: Junji Ito
Manga.comments: Junji does an amazing job at capturing cosmic horror. It's a slow burn that when it hits you, makes you feel despair and discomfort to your core.

Movies.name: 2001 A Space Odyssey
Movies.creator: Stanley Kubrick
Movies.comments: What more can I say that hasn't already been said. This shit is a masterpiece.

Movies.name: Annihilation
Movies.creator: Alex Garland
Movies.comments: The real horror here is what too much distance does to a relationship.

Movies.name: Arrival
Movies.creator: Denis Villeneuve
Movies.comments: What a beautifully told story. The aliens were pretty cool too.

Movies.name: Blade Runner
Movies.creator: Ridley Scott
Movies.comments: I still don't know what the loud "huuuuaaaaaannnnnnnnnnggg" background sound is. Spaceship taking off?

Movies.name: Blade Runner 2049
Movies.creator: Denis Villeneuve
Movies.comments: This dude is no longer The Notebook Guy. What an amazing performance. As always, Denis builds an amazing world and takes you deep into it.

Movies.name: Color out of Space
Movies.creator: Richard Stanley
Movies.comments: I'll Nick Cage screaming "COCK SUCKER" alone in the car any day.

Movies.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Movies.creator: Stanley Kubrick
Movies.comments: This movie was hilarious until it became too real.

Movies.name: Dune
Movies.creator: Denis Villeneuve
Movies.comments: This was a masterpiece. I really don't know what else to say.

Movies.name: Ex Machina
Movies.creator: Alex Garland
Movies.comments: The parallels between our current reality and what's to come are unsettling.

Movies.name: Get Out
Movies.creator: Jordan Peele
Movies.comments: A house-in-the-woods in the mountains of Caucasus are always a hit or miss. You'll either see some lame dancing or get killed.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Chamber of Secrets
Movies.creator: Chris Columbus
Movies.comments: I'm not sure how Dumbledore didn't see that little shit was crazy.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Deathly Hallows - Part 1
Movies.creator: David Yates
Movies.comments: There's a moment when the team is all alone. The music stops. You hear the wind. And you see their faces and the look of abandonment. They were all alone now. And afraid.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Deathly Hallows - Part 2
Movies.creator: David Yates
Movies.comments: If there's even been a time for you to slow clap, it was here. My boy Ron did it.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Goblet of Fire
Movies.creator: Mike Newell
Movies.comments: Harry, isn't of being a little shit to Neville, how about you show some appreciation for his intellect? It's because of people like him that the dragon didn't roast your ass.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Half-Blood Prince
Movies.creator: David Yates
Movies.comments: Snape really was like "it's my spell you little shit, sit back down".

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Order of the Phoenix
Movies.creator: David Yates
Movies.comments: It's your fault Sirius died, Harry.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Prisoner of Azkaban
Movies.creator: Alfonso Cuarón
Movies.comments: I was too young to appreciate the work of art Alfonso made for us.

Movies.name: Harry Potter and The Sorcorer's Stone
Movies.creator: Chris Columbus
Movies.comments: When I saw this movie in the theater, I knew I wanted to leave the cult.

Movies.name: Hereditary
Movies.creator: Ari Aster
Movies.comments: Picture this. You're sitting in a packed theater in the dead center because they are the best seats in the house. You just had a nice sushi dinner with your partner and are enjoying a crazy horror flick. So some cuddling is involved. Then, you see heads flying and shit. Your stomach begins to turn. The movie just keeps getting more intense. You've never felt this anxious and uncomfortable before. This is 4D cinema. You can feel what the characters are feeling. Then, the movie ends and you realize you have to take a massive shit. Sushi messed you up.

Movies.name: Interstellar
Movies.creator: Christopher Nolan
Movies.comments: My biggest fear in life is forgetting. I never want to forget the precious moments of my life and the experiences I've had. But there's always the possibility I'll get old and start to forget from time to time. When Cooper comes back from the Gargantua planet and sees what he's missed from his kid's life, I always cry. Because that is how I imagine life with Alzheimer's would be like.

Movies.name: Knives Out
Movies.creator: Rian Johnson
Movies.comments: Twists done right.

Movies.name: Midsommar
Movies.creator: Ari Aster
Movies.comments: Once again, I find myself watching an Ari movie while having digestive problems. At this point, I'm just going to start doing it with all of his movies. It gives them an extra layer of unsettlingness.

Movies.name: Napoleon Dynamite
Movies.creator: Jared Hess
Movies.comments: Your mom goes to college!

Movies.name: Once Upon a Time... In Hollywood
Movies.creator: Quentin Tarantino
Movies.comments: I don't know what exactly I love about this movie. It's a great film. But for me, I think it's the feeling of just enjoying the characters' everyday life.

Movies.name: Prometheus
Movies.creator: Ridley Scott
Movies.comments: I saw this movie on the first date I had with my wife. I don't know if it's good or bad. I just have a great memory attached to it.

Movies.name: Sinister
Movies.creator: Scott Derrickson
Movies.comments: I thought working from home would be this exciting. Instead, I just got fatter.

Movies.name: Spider-Man: Far from Home
Movies.creator: Jon Watts
Movies.comments: Best Spider-Man. Fight me.

Movies.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Movies.creator: Jon Watts
Movies.comments: Best Spider-Man. Fight me.

Movies.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Movies.creator: Rodney
Movies.comments: Best Spider-Man. You're wrong.

Movies.name: The Hateful Eight
Movies.creator: Quentin Tarantino
Movies.comments: This film is wonderfully long. The scenery alone is great reason to watch this.

Movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Movies.creator: Peter Jackson
Movies.comments: Frodo grabs the One Ring and reads the inside: "Live, Love, Laugh"

Movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Movies.creator: Peter Jackson
Movies.comments: I've cut out family because they've touched my food. I feel for Frodo.

Movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Movies.creator: Peter Jackson
Movies.comments: When Eowyn offers her disgusting stew to Aragorn in The Two Towers, there's a strand of hair in it.

Movies.name: The Shining
Movies.creator: Stanley Kubrick
Movies.comments: Jack is your everyday asshat. How nobody saw it from the beginning is beyond me.

Movies.name: The Silence of the Lamb
Movies.creator: Jonathan Demme
Movies.comments: I first saw this film when I was a sweet summer child. Why my parents allowed it is beyond me. I became a man that day.

Movies.name: The Witch
Movies.creator: Robert Eggers
Movies.comments: This is more or less what my life in the cult was like.

Anime.name: 5 Centimeters per Second
Anime.creator: Makoto Shinkai
Anime.comments: As much as it pains me to see these two kids **not** end up together, I appreciate the more realistic take on young love. This is usually how things end up.

Anime.name: 86: Eighty-Six
Anime.creator: Toshimasa Ishii
Anime.comments: It's mechs and war done right, with just the right amount of drama and romance.

Anime.name: A Silent Voice
Anime.creator: Naoko Yamada
Anime.comments: I often find it hard to relate to these sorts of characters. I'm more of a "kick 'em in the knees until they stop bullying you" type of person. But watching the asshole grow and do his best to correct his mistakes was nice.

Anime.name: Attack on Titan
Anime.creator: Hajime Isayama
Anime.comments: What Game of Thrones wanted to be.

Anime.name: Demon Slayer
Anime.creator: Koyoharu Gotouge
Anime.comments: This is unapologetically Shonen. But it does it so well. And I don't believe we'll ever be blessed with animation like this again.

Anime.name: Erased
Anime.creator: Taku Kishimoto
Anime.comments: I often find myself daydreaming about what I would do if I traveled back in time to when I was a kid, but with my memories intact. I too would kick some people's asses and help out my loved ones.

Anime.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
Anime.creator: Yasuhiro Irie
Anime.comments:
This was the first time I cried with an anime.
Nina, forever in our hearts.

Anime.name: Ghost in the Shell
Anime.creator: Mamoru Oshii
Anime.comments: Damn, they really don't make 'em like they used to. There's just so much texture and feel to the animation of this time. Cyberpunk like this wouldn't work any other way.

Anime.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
Anime.creator: Gege Akutami
Anime.comments: This is how you write female characters.

Anime.name: KonoSuba
Anime.creator: Takaomi Kanasaki
Anime.comments: There's so much isekai crap. But this has the right amount of self-awareness to be fun to watch.

Anime.name: Naruto
Anime.creator: Masashi Kishimoto
Anime.comments: I grew up with Naruto. Watched it from day one. So regardless of the quality of the story —which I believe to be great—, I will always love this show. Because I can pinpoint important moments of my childhood to Naruto episodes.

Anime.name: Naruto Shippudden
Anime.creator: Masashi Kishimoto
Anime.comments: Just like Naruto, Shippudden was there with me throughout my teenage angst and right into adulthood. I can listen to these intros and immediately recall important moments of my life.

Anime.name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
Anime.creator: Hideaki Anno
Anime.comments: This falls under the "saw it as a kid and clearly didn't get it" category. Saw it as an adult and damn does it hit differently. Loneliness is a motherfucker.

Anime.name: One-Punch Man
Anime.creator: ONE
Anime.comments: Saitama is the guy we all thought we could be. "If I work as hard as Goku, I'll be just like him".

Anime.name: Princess Mononoke
Anime.creator: Hayao Miyazaki
Anime.comments: If Lord of the Rings was a kids anime. My favorite of the Ghiblets.

Anime.name: The Last: Naruto the Movie
Anime.creator: Tsuneo Kobayashi
Anime.comments: Naruto ends here and nothing else happens afterward. You will never change my mind. This is the only ending I needed. My boy grew up to be happy.

Anime.name: Tokyo Revengers
Anime.creator: Koichi Hatsumi
Anime.comments: As a Latino man, this show is fascinating. Because to us, being in a gang just means you die very young. But I'm a sucker for time-travel stories. And this is a pretty good one.

Anime.name: Violete Evergarden
Anime.creator: Taichi Ishidate, Haruka Fujita
Anime.comments: I've always had a hard time getting my feelings across. But my mother thought me early on how to express them via letters when the words just couldn't come out. This story touches on a very emotional part of my life.

Anime.name: Weathering With You
Anime.creator: Makoto Shinkai
Anime.comments: I really hope my marriage is this adventurous when society crumbles due to climate change.

Anime.name: Your Name.
Anime.creator: Makoto Shinkai
Anime.comments: My wife and I cry every time we watch this. I too would travel through time to be with her.

Books.name: A Beautifully Foolish Endeavor
Books.creator: Hank Green
Books.comments: If life in the 2020s has thought me anything, is that people are this gullible and toxic.

Books.name: American Gods
Books.creator: Neil Gaiman
Books.comments: I grew up in a cult (sorta). Today, I don't believe in anything but the inevitable end of the universe. Reading about deities as fictional characters felt more aligned with how I view religion in general.

Books.name: An Absolutely Remarkable Thing
Books.creator: Hank Green
Books.comments: If life in the 2000s has thought me anything, it's that social media is not the problem. People are.

Books.name: Death's End
Books.creator: Cixin Liu
Books.comments: If I could leap through time and watch the end of it all, I would.

Books.name: Dune
Books.creator: Frank Herbert
Books.comments: This was a masterpiece. I really don't know what else to say.

Books.name: The Dark Forest
Books.creator: Cixin Liu
Books.comments: Knowing it'll end, that it's coming, but you just don't know when. The anxiety eats away at you until you destroy yourself.

Books.name: The Three-Body Problem
Books.creator: Cixin Liu
Books.comments: If aliens came to visit us, we'd be immediately annihilated. No species sufficiently advanced to travel the stars would come just to say hi. They'd come for something they need.

Books.name: Turtles All The Way Down
Books.creator: John Green
Books.comments: I am a simple unsalted piece of loaf. My greatest source of anxiety is not having enough time to read all the crap I want to read. This was a wonderful insight into the mind of someone that goes through life without having full control of their being. And it helped me connect with those around me that feel the same way, a little more.

Shows.name: Adventure Time
Shows.creator: Larry Leichliter
Shows.comments: This is exactly what my childhood daydreams were like...with a little less acid.

Shows.name: Bob's Burgers
Shows.creator: Loren Bouchard
Shows.comments: I relate to Gene on a spiritual level.

Shows.name: Halt and Catch Fire
Shows.creator: Christopher Cantwell, Christopher C. Rogers
Shows.comments: God, I wish my life in tech was this exhilarating. So fucking cool.

Shows.name: Legion
Shows.creator: Noah Hawley
Shows.comments: When WW3 comes and I end up this messed up in the head, I too want to bend reality to my will.

Shows.name: Mr Robot
Shows.creator: Sam Esmail
Shows.comments: What I love about this show is how they romanticize being that big of a nerd.

Shows.name: Silicon Valley
Shows.creator: Mike Judge, John Altschuler, Dave Krinsky
Shows.comments: This show is a documentary involving 80% of the people I've worked with.

Shows.name: The Expanse
Shows.creator: Mark Fergus, Hawk Ostby
Shows.comments: This is just fucking great sci-fi.

Shows.name: The Office
Shows.creator: Greg Daniels
Shows.comments: I too worked an office job once. Everyone was Angela.

Games.name: Celeste
Games.creator: Matt Makes Games
Games.comments: I failed and died more times than I could count. But it was ok. The game made me feel like it was ok to get back up and try again. That was nice.

Games.name: INSIDE
Games.creator: Playdead
Games.comments: I want more of this. Nothing flashy or fancy. Just a simple story with a bit of mystery.

Games.name: Limbo
Games.creator: Playdead
Games.comments: This was breathtakingly beautiful to play on an OLED display.

Games.name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus
Games.creator: Game Freak
Games.comments: Damn, they really tried. I think the concept is great and I would love to explore more of the pokemon world like this. But they really didn't even try with the graphics.

Games.name: The Last of Us
Games.creator: Naughty Dog
Games.comments: This should be the future of storytelling. I lived this story. And it was amazing.

Games.name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds
Games.creator: Nintendo
Games.comments: It was a bit different than previous Zelda games. But it was unique and familiar. I felt nostalgic, but not too much. And I played this through a couple of significant life events. So it always brings back those memories and holds a special in my life.

Games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
Games.creator: Nintendo
Games.comments: When I was a young boy, my father took me into the city, while I played Zelda the whole time. If I had any sort of dreams about what the franchise would be when I grew up, this far exceeded those expectations.

Games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
Games.creator: Nintendo
Games.comments: I'll take existential dread Zelda any day. Death looms at every corner of this game. Love it.
